Class TablecellBalloonTip

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  net.java.balloontip.BalloonTip
                      net.java.balloontip.CustomBalloonTip
                          net.java.balloontip.TablecellBalloonTip
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class TablecellBalloonTip
extends CustomBalloonTip

Provides the same functionality as a BalloonTip, but can attach itself to a specific JTable's cell.

Author:
Tim Molderez
See Also:
Serialized Form

closeBalloon

public void closeBalloon()
Description copied from class: BalloonTip
If you want to permanently close the balloon, use this method. (If you just need to hide the balloon, use setVisible(false);) You cannot use this BalloonTip-instance anymore after calling this method!

Overrides:
closeBalloon in class CustomBalloonTip
